description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Microsoft WS-Discovery Denial of Service vulnerability (CVE-2024-38091), it is imperative to apply the relevant security updates provided by Microsoft:

1. Identify your Windows version and architecture (x64 or 32-bit).
2. Download and apply the appropriate KB update from the official update catalog for your system:
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2 and 22H2: [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2: [KB5040431](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2 (x64 and 32-bit): [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2 (x64 and 32-bit): [KB5040448](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040448)
3. Restart your system after the installation of the updates to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update addresses the improper handling of missing special elements within the WS-Discovery protocol, which could lead to denial of service attacks.
- Before proceeding, ensure that you back up any critical data and verify the successful installation of the update packages.
